concept.title: 审批
concept.shortdesc: 审批功能分为旧版和新版，相应的后台配置和前台操作也不同。

ul.li: 旧版审批流配置和操作请参考文档：https://crm.xiaoshouyi.com/doc/document/docs/productDoc/flow/oldFlow/H5/oldFlow/index.html#t=oldFlowGuide%2Ftitle%2Ftitle.htm
新版审批流配置和操作请参考文档：https://crm.xiaoshouyi.com/doc/document/docs/productDoc/flow/newApproval/H5/newApproval/index.html#t=approvalGuide%2Ftitle%2Ftitle.htm
